column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Mako says : " Morning , Narook .
#Text=You 're not my brother !
#Text=You 're a brother betrayer !
#Text=The only one I can trust anymore is Pabu !
#Text=Pabu loves me .
#Text=" Mako says : " You 're a mess , and we 've got the biggest match of our lives tonight .
#Text=Let 's go .
#Text=" Bolin says : " No !
#Text=I 'm not going anywhere with you , you traitor !
#Text=" Mako says : " Guess we 'll have to do this the hard way .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Why ?
#Text=" Mako says : " Told you dating a teammate was a bad idea .
#Text=" Bolin says : " You 're a bad idea !
#Text=Put me down !
#Text=Put me down !
#Text=" Shiro Shinobi says : " You ca n't find two teams more evenly matched in age , size , and strength than the Fire Ferrets and the Buzzard Wasps .
#Text=Believe me , I 've looked !
#Text=This should be a pulse - pounding semifinal , folks !
#Text=The Buzzard Wasps open with a flawlessly executed combo .
#Text=All three Ferrets take an early visit to zone two .
#Text=And Mako is knocked all the way back into zone three !
#Text=The Fire Ferrets have been struggling to stay alive since the opening bell .
#Text=All three players are totally out of sync tonight .
#Text=Ooh , that has got to sting !
#Text=And Bolin loses his noodles !
#Text=Literally .
#Text=Which reminds me , this match is brought to you by our sponsor , Flameo Instant Noodles !
#Text=Noodliest noodles in the United Republic .
#Text=The Buzzard Wasps fly deeper into Ferret territory .
#Text=And Mako plunges into the pool !
#Text=Can the Fire Ferrets hold on ?
#Text=The Wasps have the Ferrets backed up to the edge now ... and the Ferrets are bailed out by the bell !
#Text=They had better pull themselves together for round two , otherwise they can kiss the finals goodbye .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Hey !
#Text=Watch it !
#Text=" Shiro Shinobi says : " The Wasps take advantage of Mako 's unforced error and Bolin is in the pool !
#Text=Ooh , and a blatant hold by the Avatar !
#Text=" Referee says : " Unnecessary roughness !
#Text=Move back one zone !
#Text=" Korra says : " I 'll unnecessarily rough you up !
#Text=" Shiro Shinobi says : " And the Avatar is slapped with the yellow fan .
#Text=The Ferrets are their own worst enemy right now .
#Text=It 's just sad to watch .
#Text=With the Buzzard Wasps leading two rounds to zilch , the Ferrets ' only hope of winning is with a knockout .
#Text=" Mako says : " Well , I guess there 's always next year .
#Text=" Korra says : " Come on !
#Text=We still have a chance , even if it is a slim one !
#Text=" Bolin says : " The way we 're playing , we do n't even deserve to be in the finals .
#Text=" Korra says : " Look , if we do n't pull together and work as a team , we 'll never forgive ourselves .
#Text=" Mako says : " Let 's just get this over with .
#Text=" Bolin says : " The sooner , the better .
#Text=" Shiro Shinobi says : " Bolin 's knocked into zone two , followed quickly by his brother !
#Text=And Bolin takes a zinger to the shoulder !
#Text=Looks like it 's a clean hit .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Owww !
#Text=" Mako says : " Bolin !
#Text=" Shiro Shinobi says : " Mako 's in the drink and out of the match .
#Text=And Bolin keeps playing with one good arm !
#Text=I got ta hand it to him , this kid 's got grit !
#Text=But how long can he keep it up ?
#Text=Apparently , not very long .
#Text=The Ferrets ' dream of making it to the finals now rests in the Avatar 's hands .
#Text=But with three on one , I do n't like her odds .
#Text="
